While ties between Moscow and Washington remain stuck in a deep freeze, Jean-Claude Juncker’s visit will mark the highest-level trip to Russia by a top EU official in Brussels since the beginning of the conflict in Ukraine, where the U.S. and Europe accuse Russia of supporting and directing separatists in...

The European Commission’s president will attend Russian President Vladimir Putin’s showcase St. Petersburg International Economic Forum on Thursday, raising hopes in Moscow that relations with Europe are poised for a thaw.
